articles.title: Coast Guard suspends search for people missing from fishing vessel that sank off Cape Ann
articles.description:
Crews covered about 1,000 square miles using aircraft, cutters and small boats over a 24-hour period.

The post Coast Guard suspends search for people missing from fishing vessel that sank off Cape Ann appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Coast Guard suspended search for missing crew from a fishing vessel off Cape Ann.
Search covered approximately 1,000 square miles over 24 hours using various resources.
Local fishing community affected as hopes diminish for recovery of missing individuals.
